Regulation Name(s): Culture Medium for Antimicrobial Susceptibility Test
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Selective and differential chromogenic culture medium
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bio-Rad MRSASelect, a chromogenic culture medium for detection of MRSA colonization from nasal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Selective and differential chromogenic medium for qualitative detection of nasal colonization of methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) to aid in prevention and control of MRSA infections in healthcare settings; not intended for diagnosis or monitoring of infection
